description: Get IP address ranges used by Shopee API

parameters.name: partner_id
parameters.description: Partner ID is assigned after registration is successful. Required for all requests.

parameters.name: timestamp
parameters.description: This is to indicate the timestamp of the request. Required for all requests. Expires in 5 minutes.

parameters.name: sign
parameters.description: Signature generated by partner_id, api URL timestamp and partner_key via HMAC-SHA256 hashing algorithm.

response_fields.name: request_id
response_fields.description: The identifier for an API request for error tracking

response_fields.name: error
response_fields.description: Indicate error type if hit error

response_fields.name: message
response_fields.description: Indicate error details if hit error
